entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Change DefaultAutomaticDecompression to DecompressionMethods.All #108163
  • JsonElement vs JsonDocument Parse: why no UseArrayPools #108157
  • Access violation with Native AOT when calling an abstract property #108154
  • Frequency of Metrics report #108152
  • [WASI][socket] WriteTimeout, ReadTimeout missing #108151
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Adding headers with a method #108148
  • Application freezes during GC #108144
    Future
  • `NetworkCredential` method parameters nullability do not match `ICredentials` and `ICredentialsByHost` #108134
  • [API Proposal]: Hooking into service construction in default DI implementation #108132
    Future
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.InaccessibleValidationAttributesTest #108129
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.InaccessibleValidationAttributesTest #108128
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionContainerCycleTests.APostDependsOnBNone_ShouldNotThrow #108127
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.InaccessibleValidationAttributesTest #108126
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649.cmd #108125
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: managed/Compilation/Compilation/Compilation.cmd #108124
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/superpmi/superpmicollect/superpmicollect.cmd #108123
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: GC/API/NoGCRegion/Callback/Callback.cmd #108122
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_11408/GitHub_11408/GitHub_11408.cmd #108121
  • .net8 ver8.0.8 Desktop Crash 0x80131506 #108118

Closed

  • ConfigurationBuilder: multiple JSON sources results in badly-handled top-level lists #108138
    Future
  • IdnMapping.GetAscii and GetUnicode throw ArgumentException on Linux #107900
    10.0.0
  • .Net9 RC1 Crash when creating Java Runtime through interop (and also .Net9 all previews) #107651
    9.0.0
  • Updating to .net 6 causes higher lock contention #108057
  • Test failure:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttributeTests.ImportIndexers_ShouldThrowSomething #108130
  • Potential memory leak in ep_file_write_event error path #107970
    10.0.0
  • `UnsafeAccessor` works with AOT but does not work with JIT for a type of Class<float> shape #108046
  • `ThreadPoolWorkQueue..ctor` randomly will never return #104322
    10.0.0
  • Deadlock in ThreadPool.GetMaxThreads() during app start. #93175
    10.0.0
  • Deadlock in System.Diagnostics.Tracing.FrameworkEventSource on application startup #105682
    10.0.0
  • Port System.Diagnostics docs for .NET 9 APIs #105980
    9.0.0
  • CS8795 on GeneratedRegex attributed method #108133
  • Confusing API for taking items from BlockingCollection #108054
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: allow ref struct for linq Select method #108131

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix createdump 'stack smashing detected' error on arm64 #108166
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • remove dead code from BCL.cs #108165
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix switchrecognition for jitstress #108161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [TestOnly] noop change #108158
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [cdac] break up cdacreader into 4 separate assemblies #108156
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove a lock contention test #108155
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Support for devirtualizing array interface methods #108153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use linear block order for MinOpts in LSRA #108147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `Process.Threads` by PSS APIs for >=Win 10 #108146
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Rename SourceBuildUseMonoRuntime property, which is not SB specific #108145
    needs-area-label
  • [Ppc64le] binaryformatter and tensors tests fix #108120
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Optimize `Dictionary<>.TryInsert()` by using `ref var` #108119
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add FreeBSD as valid test host. #106302
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix typos #108116
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Document Important Note About the Host and the CLR for Testing #108162
    documentation, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-rc2] dont try to capture threadId for NativeAOT #108091
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr
  • Delete unused RedirectFunctor abstraction #108113
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoid lock contention during thread creation of thread pool #108135
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add new properties for the new non-JSON-based deb tooling #107429
    blocking, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • More doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #107965
    area-Extensions-Options
  • [release/9.0] dont try to capture threadId for NativeAOT #108088
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 129.0.6668.58, windows: 129.0.6668.59 #108105
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Cleanup after GC info version update. #108117
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Improve Guid v7 performance on Unix #106525
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Enable NuGet Audit and fix issues #107639
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add DNMD into src/native #107961
    NO-MERGE, Hackathon, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • Fixing SetSlice, Reshape, TryCopyTo. #107852
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Remove some implicit Helper Method Frames (HMF) #107648
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Check HFA alignment for valuetype fields #106099
    arch-arm32, arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Extend preinitialization arithmetic and string manipulation #105429
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 10.0.0
  • InlineArray design spec/doc #108044
    documentation, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Issue a deprecation warning for COMPlus_ prefix #107759
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Allow stack allocate objects in loops #106526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • ARM64: Fix lsra for AdvSimd_LoadAndInsertScalar #107786
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc2' => 'release/9.0' #108006
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 9.0.0
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #107804
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough checks in Compiler::TryLowerSwitchToBitTest #108106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add loop-aware RPO, and use as LSRA's block sequence #108086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix wrong drive format on Unix #107365
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix some minor errors #107179
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • API Compat doesn't validate changes to structs that would break compat #43628
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.2.24470.13] DiscordChatExporter build with warning：‘ServicePointManager' is obsolete: 'WebRequest, HttpWebRequest, ServicePoint, and WebClient are obsolete. #43621
  • Default Uri is wrong when dotnet publish docker image to insecure registry #43618

Closed

  • Value objects: ToString override is not inherited #43617
  • [WebToolsE2E] After installing .NET SDK 9.0 RC2, an error "MSB4018: The "DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints" task failed unexpectedly." in the Error List when create ASP.NET Core Web App (Razor Pages) or MVC 6.0/8.0 IndAuth project. #43407

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove WorkloadManifestValidator stub project #43642
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Allow reading of OCI Image Indexes to determine RID-specific base image for multi-architecture images #43631
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rename SourceBuildUseMonoRuntime property, which is not SB specific #43626
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix port when fall back to http #43620
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43619
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Publish prebuilt reports for each repo #43595
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • UpdateNuGetConfigPackageSourcesMappings: don't add empty mappings #43616
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Exclude false positive license ref for fsharp patch #43623
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • insert 9.0.2xx into the codeflow #43608
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2545310 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Report msbuild diagnostics as warnings/errors. #43571
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix parsing of ports that lack port type metadata #43551
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [release/9.0.1xx] make error for workload info clean Fixes #42581 #43587
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43491
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Pass official build id props via /p: #43520
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime, dotnet/aspnetcore and windowsdesktop codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.1 September 2024 Updates #43363
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change to attempt launching browser on dotnet run - Related Issue #9038 #43615
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Encapsulate field" throws an error when field with uppercase name is declared in class with primary constructor #75210
  • Collection expressions can avoid additional local when constructing a `List<T>` of fixed size #75208

Closed

  • Editing Roslyn.sln in VSCode crashes with frequent stack overflows #75155
  • Unexpected value `QueryClause` of type `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.BoundKind` #75194
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35322.09 #75206

PullRequests

Created

  • Use manual recursion for binary patterns #75212
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • docs: fix C# 13 proposal link #75207
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Field-backed properties: definite assignment #75116
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ignore irrelevant exceptions when reporting LSP server NFW #75150
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2543568 #75195
    auto-merge
  • VisitCollectionBuilderCollectionExpression - Ensure target of a spread element is rewritten. #75201
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next

Updated

  • EnC: allow changing accessibility of members #75191
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, 17.12
  • Updates content exclusion for on-the-fly-docs #75172
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Async rename commit #74794
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Fix symbol info in identifier name in object initializer #74582
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when inferring unique method signature #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #75180
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Optimise allocations in `AssertEx.NormalizeWhitespace` and `OperationTreeVerifier.Verify` #75202
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13
  • Use MSBuild globs to determine which file changes are relevant #75139
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix null dereference in GetAssemblyReferenceAlias #75094
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove LittleEndian asserts #75159
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Skip tests on Mono #75160
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM app : impossible to update index.html in debug #58047
  • Setting PathBase breaks Browserlink #58046
  • Add checkbox checked validation #58044
  • libreria QuickGrid net core 8 #58040
  • Missing call to AddAuthorization() in Blazor Auto interactivity template #58039
  • Perf regression: json #58038
  • Add new overloads to IStringLocalizerFactory to enable creating IStringLocalizer instances for a specific culture #58037

Closed

  • Missing package README file #48392
    9.0.0
  • RenderMode names really hard to explain and confused a lot beginners. #58023
  • Micro Frontends with Blazor #58021
  • RequestDelegateGenerator generates invalid code for optional array parameters #57175
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plaintext, plaintext #58012
  • Perf improvement: caching #58019
  • .NET9 preview's OpenAPI document generation doesn't work when transcoded from gRPC #58010
  • NavigationManager.NavigateToLogout() stuck on authentication/logout-callback - reopen. #57202
  • Governing the date with EditForm #57860
  • How can one measure how long returning a static file takes? #57763

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Unquarantine ServerReset_BeforeRequestBody_ClientBodyThrows" #58043
    area-networking
  • Use ImpersonationToken for IIS Windows Auth #58041
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Rename SourceBuildUseMonoRuntime property, which is not SB specific #58035
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix up OpenAPI schema handling and support concurrent requests #58024
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Merged

  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-rc.2.24468.2 #58028
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.EntityFrameworkCore` package README #57840
    area-middleware, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/9.0] Fix skip condition for IIS tests #57999
    tell-mode, area-networking, 9.0.0
  • Fix code generation for parsing optional array parameters in RequestDelegateGenerator #57336
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57942
    area-infrastructure
  • Add public method to QuickGrid to close column options UI #57904
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • feat: extending `ApiBehaviorOptions` with skip `SkipStatusCodePages` #57597
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • ApiExplorer Support for HttpResults types for Controllers #57464
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Unquarantine fixed tests that have not failed in 30 days #57978
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet-counters does not report values from multiple Metrics Meters with distinct tags #4564
  • How to debug stack overflow errors on Windows #3506
    9.0.0

Updated

  • dotnet-dump not working when process run as user #4375
    10.0.0
  • dotnet stack hangup on trying to get the stackframes of a stuck process #4826
    10.0.0
  • libsosplugin cannot be loaded into lldb (macos arm64) #4259
    9.0.0
  • Crashing attempting to call `dumplog` #4446
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix linux-arm64 libsosplugin.so not loading #4954

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • absence d,application #24885
  • FlexLayout inside ScrollView not scrolling correctly on iPhone 8 Plus #24883
  • [regression/8.0.99-ci.net8.24472.1] Invalidate Shadow Issue: VisualElement.Shadow property change no longer invalidates platform shadow #24882
  • IOS Binding Library - the native class hasn't been loaded. #24881
  • Upgrade from 8.0.70 to 8.0.82 Apple reports apple push notifications are being used. #24880
  • AppThemeBinding does not work on ToolbarItems #24878
  • Bump WinAPPSDK to 1.6 #24875
    9.0-rc2
  • Role-based authorization not working correctly when using Blazor WebView in MAUI App #24874
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Unable to run\Debug MAUI Application with net 8 #24868
  • [Windows] CollectionView with grouping fails to add items when a footer template is present or crashes when removing data. #24866
  • Button control: inconsistent border visibility behaviour iOS vs Android when BackgroundColor is Transparent (also with respect to Xamarin.Forms) #24864
  • How to Highlight Arabic text after search with continuity in MAUI #24863
  • Android - picker on hidden page opens after back navigation #24862

Closed

  • APT0003 and other errors with new template #19489
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Focus and blur event get triggered unnecessarily #21841
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Adding value dynamically using parameters to the InputTextarea in the OnBindingContextChanged after some delay, the value not updated properly. #22486
    .NET 9 Planning
  • MAUI blazor form HTML and JS POST DO NOT WORK #24336
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [net9.0] Shift platforms specific code from HybridWebView to the handler using Command Mappers #24269
    9.0-rc2
  • Type binding Error with .NET 9 Preview 6 #23551
    9.0-rc2
  • [Binding SG] Match behavior of compiled bindings with indexers to their counterparts #24255
    9.0-rc2
  • Android page reloading or view issue #24709
  • Android CollectionView loads all Views and locks up UI when soft keyboard shown. #24675
  • Loading initial data from a json file of data 4000 in ObservableCollection is lagging the application to start. #24677
  • Unable to build a brand new .NET MAUI Balzor hybrid App using .NET 8 #24680

PullRequests

Created

  • Update default `BlazorWebView` host address #24884
  • [net9.0] Update rc2 versions #24877
  • [net9.0] Revert "Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers" #24876
  • [iOS] Fix for the CollectionView to prevent duplicate groups or crashes when adding a new item to a group or when adding a new group. #24873
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • FlyoutItemIsVisible property in Shell Items is always true #24871
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24869
    area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView with grouping fails to add items when a footer template is present or crashes when removing data. #24867
    community ✨
  • Source Generation for XAML #24865

Merged

  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #24870
    area-infrastructure
  • [xaml] fix potential NRE in `{Binding}` #24756
    area-xaml
  • Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers #24479
    area-controls-hybridwebview

Updated

  • [iOS] Text alignment in editor - improvements #24859
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Setting Background to null will update rendering on Android and iOS #24726
    area-theme
  • [macios] Bump .NET 8 to support Xcode 16.0 #24833
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix memory leak with GroupedItemTemplateCollection #23386
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Implicitly set SupportedOSPlatformVersion #23857
    9.0-rc2
  • Avoid throwing in async void when applying relative source bindings #24780
    area-xaml
  • Fix ShellContent Title doesn't observe changes to bound properties #24806
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    community ✨
  • Fix Provided consistent behavior of text color in tabbed page in all platforms. #24782
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support ExecuteDelete and ExecuetUpdate for sqllite #34741
  • Migration source generator #34739
  • `Contains` on `IQueryable<string>` seems to consistently evaluate to FALSE. #34738

Closed

  • Add support for logical XOR #34736
  • [9.0] New translations and SQL optimization/simplification #34151
    9.0.0
  • InvalidOperationException with multiple HasDbFunction in 9 RC1 #34672
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Fix to #34728 - Split query with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException #34743
  • Fix to #34728 - Split query with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException #34742

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.43.0 to 3.43.1 #34740
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34719
  • Fix test and a bit of code cleanup #34731
